      • setSystemTime

        public void setSystemTime(org.joda.time.DateTime systemTime)
        Will set the system time of the clock to the given system time
        Parameters:
        systemTime - The system time to which the clock will be set.
        Postcondition:
        The system time of the clock will be set to the parameter.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given system time is null.

      • advanceSystemTime

        public void advanceSystemTime(org.joda.time.DateTime systemTime)
        Will advance the system time.
        Parameters:
        systemTime - The system time to which the clock will be set.
        Postcondition:
        The system time of the clock will be set to the parameter.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given system time is null or before the current system time.

      • createMemento

        public ClockMemento createMemento()
        Will return a new clock memento with the system time of the current clock.
        Returns:
        Returns a new clock memento object with the system time of the current clock.

      • setMemento

        public void setMemento(ClockMemento m)
        Sets the system time of the clock to the state of the clock memento parameter
        Parameters:
        m - The clock memento object of which the state will be used.
        Postcondition:
        The system time of the clock will be set to the state of the clock memento object.
